<span>
</span><span><strong style="color:#000">Markets: </strong></span><span>Like you after a 15-minute run, stocks spent roughly eight hours </span><span><a href="https://www.cnbc.com/2021/07/27/stock-market-futures-open-to-close-news.html?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">barely moving</a></span><span>.</span><span><strong style="color:#000"> </strong></span><span>Boeing, though, did gain after posting its </span><span><a href="https://apnews.com/article/business-4b417ed48335b139d5500fa70d19f13f?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">first profit</a></span><span> in nearly two years.</span>

<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">

<div class="c6 " style="margin-bottom:7px">
<!-- <![endif]-->
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
WORK
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/07/28/delta-variant-puts-breaks-return-office?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
Finding Out the Office Is Closed for Another Month
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/07/28/delta-variant-puts-breaks-return-office?utm_source=morning_brew" style="text-decoration:none;border:none;" target="_blank" class="">
<!--[if mso]>
<img alt="Big bird smashing down door" style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" height=377 src="https://media.giphy.com/media/H6W9H29kVsUI2hJE90/giphy.gif">
<![endif]-->
<!--[if !mso]>--><!-- -->
<img class="story-header-image" alt="Big bird smashing down door" style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" src="https://media.giphy.com/media/H6W9H29kVsUI2hJE90/giphy.gif">
<!--<![endif]-->
</a>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;">
<small><em>Giphy</em></small>
</p>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding:15px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Google employees hung up their business hoodies and put on their home hoodies after CEO Sundar Pichai <a href="https://www.cnbc.com/2021/07/28/google-postpones-return-to-work-until-october-will-require-vaccinations.html?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">postponed</a> the company’s return to the office by a month-and-a-half, to mid-October. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Google's one of a number of companies rethinking their workplace plans due to the—okay fine we’ll go there—fourth wave of Covid-19.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Many companies had pegged their office reopenings to Labor Day, the unofficial end of summer and 18 months to the <em>week</em> after the WHO declared Covid-19 a global pandemic. Morgan Stanley CEO James Gorman said he’d be “very disappointed if people haven’t found their way into the office” by Labor Day. The Delta variant said, “You’re about to be disappointed, Mr. Gorman.”</p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>Last week, Apple pushed its return-to-office date back until at least October, and yesterday restored mask requirements in most of its US stores for staff and customers.</span></li>
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>While other major companies haven’t publicly updated their timelines, spokespeople for tech giants like Facebook have </span><span><a href="https://www.wsj.com/articles/the-office-is-back-what-if-covid-has-other-plans-11627099214?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">said</a></span><span> that health data, not a date, would decide when offices would be back to full capacity.</span>
</li>
</ul>
<h2 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0">Are vaccine mandates the fastest route back?</h2>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">In its announcement yesterday, Google said that anyone coming into the office would need to be vaccinated. Facebook, Morgan Stanley, Goldman Sachs, and United Airlines have all made similar moves. And after Monday’s <a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/07/26/covid-vaccine-mandates-gaining-traction?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">mandate madness</a> from NYC and California, it tracks that today President Biden is expected to <a href="https://www.cnn.com/2021/07/27/politics/vaccine-mandate-for-federal-employees-under-consideration/index.html?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">announce</a> all federal employees will need to get the Covid vaccine or take regular tests.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Zoom out:</strong> It’s not just some senior execs who are desperate for employees to return to business districts. The Ultas, Sweetgreens, and transit systems of the world are counting on you to spend money during the workday like you did in 2019. Returning to the office is an economy-wide issue that influences everything from real estate to e-commerce. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><em>Note: An earlier version of this article incorrectly stated that Wells Fargo was requiring vaccination from its employees. That has been removed.</em></p>

<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">

<tr>
<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
IPO
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/07/28/bull-bear-case-robinhoods-ipo?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
Bullz n the HOOD
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/07/28/bull-bear-case-robinhoods-ipo?utm_source=morning_brew" style="text-decoration:none;border:none;" target="_blank" class="">
<img alt="The NYSE with the Robinhood hat and logo" style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" class="story-header-image" src="https://dlp31coh2a67q.cloudfront.net/eyJrZXkiOiJ1cGxvYWRzL21lZGl1bS9hc3NldC81OTQ5L3JvYmluaG9vZF9pcG8uanBnIiwiYnVja2V0Ijoib3Nsby1wcm9kdWN0aW9uIiwiZWRpdHMiOnsicmVzaXplIjp7IndpZHRoIjoxMDAwLCJoZWlnaHQiOm51bGx9fX0=">
</a>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;">
<small><em></em></small>
</p>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding:15px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Trading app Robinhood is set to IPO this morning under the ticker symbol HOOD in one of the most <a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/07/26/robinhoods-roadshow-previews-ipo-unlike?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">unusual public offerings</a> ever. Are you going to invest? </p>
<h2 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0">The bear case</h2>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Those who don’t think Robinhood will <a href="https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2021-07-28/robinhood-hood-ipo-date-price-and-is-it-worth-buying-the-meme-stock-app?sref=KkPzpZvz" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">charge into the green</a> on its opening day are concerned about the app’s seemingly endless run-ins with regulators—leading to penalties like a recent $70 million fine. Both the Financial Industry Regulatory Authority (FINRA) and the SEC have investigated Robinhood this year... </p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>Most notably for how it restricted trading activity during the GameStop frenzy in January</span></li>
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>Most recently (Tuesday) for CEO Vlad Tenev’s </span><span><a href="https://www.cnn.com/2021/07/27/investing/robinhood-ipo-finra-vlad-tenev/index.html?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">nonexistent</a></span><span> FINRA license and employee trading</span>
</li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Other doubters think that when the pandemic ends, app downloads and trading activity will slow and the meme stock craze won’t reignite.</p>
<h2 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0">The bull case</h2>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">The obvious reason to feel bullish about $HOOD? The fast-growing company paved the way for Average Joe traders to feel like Ferragamo-wearing Wall Streeters. Proponents think it’ll continue to be the app of choice for a growing army of individual investors that Robinhood empowered with its zero-commission model and sleek interface.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">As for regulatory scrutiny, Robinhood says it has room to grow into far less sketchy spaces, like retirement accounts.</p>

<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
COVID
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/07/28/pfizer-expects-covid-vaccine-bring-335-billion-year?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
The Real Pandemic Winner
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/07/28/pfizer-expects-covid-vaccine-bring-335-billion-year?utm_source=morning_brew" style="text-decoration:none;border:none;" target="_blank" class="">
<img alt='Dog in fire meme, pfizer logo on dog while he says, "This is great."' style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" class="story-header-image" src="https://dlp31coh2a67q.cloudfront.net/eyJrZXkiOiJ1cGxvYWRzL21lZGl1bS9hc3NldC81OTUxL3BmaXplci5qcGVnIiwiYnVja2V0Ijoib3Nsby1wcm9kdWN0aW9uIiwiZWRpdHMiOnsicmVzaXplIjp7IndpZHRoIjoxMDAwLCJoZWlnaHQiOm51bGx9fX0=">
</a>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;">
<small><em></em></small>
</p>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding:15px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">If you think Co-star notifications thrive on chaos, check out Pfizer. The drugmaker projected that Covid-19 vaccine sales would hit <a href="https://www.irishtimes.com/business/health-pharma/pfizer-s-covid-vaccine-on-course-to-rank-among-top-selling-medicines-1.4632684?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">$33.5 billion</a> this year, a 29% bump from previous estimates. That would make the vaccine the world’s best-selling drug of all time, easily topping current leaders AbbVie’s Humira and Merck’s Keytruda.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Why the rosy outlook? </strong>This pandemic ain’t over. With Delta fueling surges across the globe, the company thinks that a third booster shot will be needed for extra protection. It plans to ask the US for regulatory approval for its booster next month.</p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>Plus, it’s charging more. The US recently paid </span><span><a href="https://www.wsj.com/articles/u-s-buys-200-million-covid-19-vaccines-from-pfizer-and-biontech-at-about-24-a-shot-11627078710?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">$24/dose</a></span><span> for an order of 200 million doses, up from the $19.50/dose it paid Pfizer for previous orders.</span>
</li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Zoom out: </strong>Just because you’ve developed a lifesaving vaccine doesn’t automatically make you rich. J&J, whose one-shot vax has been stymied by side effect concerns and manufacturing errors, is <a href="https://www.cnbc.com/2021/07/21/johnson-johnson-jnj-earnings-q2-2021.html?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">projecting</a> only $2.5 billion in sales from its vaccine this year. Moderna will report its earnings Aug. 5.</p>

<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">

<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
GRAB BAG
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/07/28/key-performance-indicators-july-29?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
Key Performance Indicators
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/07/28/key-performance-indicators-july-29?utm_source=morning_brew" style="text-decoration:none;border:none;" target="_blank" class="">
<img alt="US electricity generation chart" style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" class="story-header-image" src="https://dlp31coh2a67q.cloudfront.net/eyJrZXkiOiJ1cGxvYWRzL21lZGl1bS9hc3NldC81OTM1L3VzX2VsZWN0cmljaXR5X2dlbmVyYXRpb25fY2hhcnQucG5nIiwiYnVja2V0Ijoib3Nsby1wcm9kdWN0aW9uIiwiZWRpdHMiOnsicmVzaXplIjp7IndpZHRoIjoxMDAwLCJoZWlnaHQiOm51bGx9fX0=">
</a>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;">
<small><em>EIA</em></small>
</p>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding:15px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Stat: </strong>Renewables became the <a href="https://www.eia.gov/todayinenergy/detail.php?id=48896" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">second-most prevalent</a> energy source in the US last year, behind only natural gas. Accounting for 21% of all electricity generation, renewables topped nuclear and coal for the first time. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Quote: </strong>“So first things first, instead of waking up at 8:20 and join a useless meeting at 8:30, be on mute, and proceed to go make my breakfast and take my dog for a walk, I now have to wake up at 7, get properly dressed (no more comfortable clothes), make sure I have lunch and breakfast prepped, get on the highway, drive, get there at 8:15, mindless chit chat till 8:30, join the same useless meeting on zoom (with coworkers from around the globe, what's the f. point?) and now I HAVE to/MUST pretend to pay attention to something that has no relation to what I work with because well, I got no more flexibility on my surrounding environment.”</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">One Reddit user <a href="https://www.reddit.com/r/cscareerquestions/comments/oosru6/i_went_to_the_office_for_the_first_time_i_fucking/?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">wrote</a> about going back to the office for the first time since the pandemic started...and why they [bleeping] hated it. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Read: </strong>Why is so much American bureaucracy left to average citizens? (<a href="https://www.theatlantic.com/politics/archive/2021/07/how-government-learned-waste-your-time-tax/619568/?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">The Atlantic</a>)</p>

</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">

</a>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;">
<small><em>CNBC</em></small>
</p>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding:15px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">McDonald’s said that its BTS meal and its highly original, never-been-done-before fried chicken sandwich helped boost same-store sales <a href="https://www.cnbc.com/2021/07/28/mcdonalds-mcd-q2-2021-earnings.html?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">nearly 26%</a> last quarter.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">By collabing with the K-pop superstars on a special meal (10 McNuggets, fries, Coke, and fun sauces), McDonald’s was revisiting similar promotions it ran with artists J Balvin and Travis Scott. We’re expecting more considering BTS’s dynamite success.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Anything else you should know? </strong>Drive-thru times <a href="https://www.reuters.com/business/retail-consumer/mcdonalds-sales-surge-bts-meal-craze-easing-restrictions-2021-07-28/?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">increased</a> by three seconds due to the labor shortage, but CEO Chris Kempczinski said more job applications were flowing in and that dining rooms should be 100% open by Labor Day.</p>

<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Brew Mini: </strong>You know what they say—good things come in small puzzles. <a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/07/28/brew-mini-gold?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">Play the Mini here</a>.</p>
<h2 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0">Three headlines and a lie</h2>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">If you need an Olympics news break, we’ve got the perfect distraction: Us lying to you. Try to guess which headline is fake and which three are wild, but very real:</p>
<ol style="list-style-type: lower-alpha;">
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>Robert Downey Jr. </span><span><a href="https://vegnews.com/2021/7/robert-downey-jr-nobell-foods-cheese?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">says</a></span><span> this vegan cheese startup puts the “eco in queso”</span>
</li>
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>Ethereum founder Vitalik Buterin to be </span><span><a href="https://markets.businessinsider.com/news/currencies/vitalik-buterin-paid-ether-for-mila-kunis-nft-stoner-cats-2021-7?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">paid</a></span><span> in ether for role as monocle-wearing Lord Catsington in Mila Kunis's NFT animated series 'Stoner Cats'</span>
</li>
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>Justice Department </span><span><a href="https://www.nbcnews.com/politics/politics-news/justice-department-seizes-rare-ancient-tablet-illegally-auctioned-hobby-lobby-n1275217?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">seizes</a></span><span> rare, ancient tablet illegally auctioned to Hobby Lobby</span>
</li>
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>Bakersfield man </span><span><a href="https://media.giphy.com/media/MpojLecQpaMDe/giphy.gif?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">banned</a></span><span> from Walgreens after duping workers into getting his ninth Moderna dose</span>
</li>
</ol>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
</th>
</tr>

src=\"https://media.giphy.com/media/H6W9H29kVsUI2hJE90/giphy.gif\"\u003e\n\u003c![endif]--\u003e\n\u003c!--[if !mso]\u003e--\u003e\u003c!-- --\u003e\n\u003cimg class=\"story-header-image\" alt=\"Big style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;\"\u003e\n\u003csmall\u003e\u003cem\u003eGiphy\u003c/em\u003e\u003c/small\u003e\n\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003ctable width=\"100%\" cellpadding=\"0\" cellspacing=\"0\" border=\"0\" style=\"border-collapse: collapse;\"\u003e\n\u003ctr\u003e\n\u003ctd style=\"padding:15px\"\u003e\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eGoogle employees hung up their business hoodies and put on their home hoodies after CEO Sundar Pichai \u003ca href=\"https://www.cnbc.com/2021/07/28/google-postpones-return-to-work-until-october-will-require-vaccinations.html?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003epostponed\u003c/a\u003e the company’s return to the office by a month-and-a-half, to mid-October. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eGoogle's one of a number of companies rethinking their workplace plans due to the—okay fine we’ll go there—fourth wave of Covid-19.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eMany companies had pegged their office reopenings to Labor Day, the unofficial end of summer and 18 months to the \u003cem\u003eweek\u003c/em\u003e after the WHO declared Covid-19 a global pandemic. Morgan Stanley CEO James Gorman said he’d be “very disappointed if people haven’t found their way into the office” by Labor Day. The Delta variant said, “You’re about to be disappointed, Mr. Gorman.”\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cul style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\r\n\u003cli aria-level=\"1\" style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eLast week, Apple pushed its return-to-office date back until at least October, and yesterday restored mask requirements in most of its US stores for staff and customers.\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003cli aria-level=\"1\" style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\n\u003cspan\u003eWhile other major companies haven’t publicly updated their timelines, spokespeople for tech giants like Facebook have \u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\u003ca href=\"https://www.wsj.com/articles/the-office-is-back-what-if-covid-has-other-plans-11627099214?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003esaid\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e that health data, not a date, would decide when offices would be back to full capacity.\u003c/span\u003e\n\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\r\n\u003ch2 style=\"font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0\"\u003eAre vaccine mandates the fastest route back?\u003c/h2\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eIn its announcement yesterday, Google said that anyone coming into the office would need to be vaccinated. Facebook, Morgan Stanley, Goldman Sachs, and United Airlines have all made similar moves. And after Monday’s \u003ca href=\"https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/07/26/covid-vaccine-mandates-gaining-traction?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003emandate madness\u003c/a\u003e from NYC and California, it tracks that today President Biden is expected to \u003ca href=\"https://www.cnn.com/2021/07/27/politics/vaccine-mandate-for-federal-employees-under-consideration/index.html?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003eannounce\u003c/a\u003e all federal employees will need to get the Covid vaccine or take regular tests.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eZoom out:\u003c/strong\u003e It’s not just some senior execs who are desperate for employees to return to business districts. The Ultas, Sweetgreens, and transit systems of the world are counting on you to spend money during the workday like you did in 2019. Returning to the office is an economy-wide issue that influences everything from real estate to e-commerce. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cem\u003eNote: An earlier version of this article incorrectly stated that Wells Fargo was requiring vaccination from its employees. style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eTrading app Robinhood is set to IPO this morning under the ticker symbol HOOD in one of the most \u003ca Are you going to invest? \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003ch2 style=\"font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0\"\u003eThe bear case\u003c/h2\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eThose who don’t think Robinhood will \u003ca href=\"https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2021-07-28/robinhood-hood-ipo-date-price-and-is-it-worth-buying-the-meme-stock-app?sref=KkPzpZvz\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003echarge into the green\u003c/a\u003e on its opening day are concerned about the app’s seemingly endless run-ins with regulators—leading to penalties like a recent $70 million fine. Both the Financial Industry Regulatory Authority (FINRA) and the SEC have investigated Robinhood this year... \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cul style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\r\n\u003cli aria-level=\"1\" style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eMost notably for how it restricted trading activity during the GameStop frenzy in January\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003cli aria-level=\"1\" style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\n\u003cspan\u003eMost recently (Tuesday) for CEO Vlad Tenev’s \u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\u003ca href=\"https://www.cnn.com/2021/07/27/investing/robinhood-ipo-finra-vlad-tenev/index.html?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003enonexistent\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e FINRA license and employee trading\u003c/span\u003e\n\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eOther doubters think that when the pandemic ends, app downloads and trading activity will slow and the meme stock craze won’t reignite.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003ch2 style=\"font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0\"\u003eThe bull case\u003c/h2\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eThe obvious reason to feel bullish about $HOOD? The fast-growing company paved the way for Average Joe traders to feel like Ferragamo-wearing Wall Streeters. Proponents think it’ll continue to be the app of choice for a growing army of individual investors that Robinhood empowered with its zero-commission model and sleek interface.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eAs for regulatory scrutiny, Robinhood says it has room to grow into far less sketchy spaces, like retirement style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eIf you think Co-star notifications thrive on chaos, check out Pfizer. The drugmaker projected that Covid-19 vaccine sales would hit \u003ca href=\"https://www.irishtimes.com/business/health-pharma/pfizer-s-covid-vaccine-on-course-to-rank-among-top-selling-medicines-1.4632684?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003e$33.5 billion\u003c/a\u003e this year, a 29% bump from previous estimates. That would make the vaccine the world’s best-selling drug of all time, easily topping current leaders AbbVie’s Humira and Merck’s Keytruda.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eWhy the rosy outlook? \u003c/strong\u003eThis pandemic ain’t over. With Delta fueling surges across the globe, the company thinks that a third booster shot will be needed for extra protection. It plans to ask the US for regulatory approval for its booster next month.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cul style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\r\n\u003cli aria-level=\"1\" style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\n\u003cspan\u003ePlus, it’s charging more. The US recently paid \u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\u003ca href=\"https://www.wsj.com/articles/u-s-buys-200-million-covid-19-vaccines-from-pfizer-and-biontech-at-about-24-a-shot-11627078710?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003e$24/dose\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e for an order of 200 million doses, up from the $19.50/dose it paid Pfizer for previous orders.\u003c/span\u003e\n\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eZoom out: \u003c/strong\u003eJust because you’ve developed a lifesaving vaccine doesn’t automatically make you rich. J\u0026J, whose one-shot vax has been stymied by side effect concerns and manufacturing errors, is \u003ca href=\"https://www.cnbc.com/2021/07/21/johnson-johnson-jnj-earnings-q2-2021.html?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003eprojecting\u003c/a\u003e only $2.5 billion in sales from its vaccine this year.
